parameters.name: Transparency
parameters.description: 0 = opaque 1 = transparent describing the relative transparency depending on the value of Style

parameters.name: MatchingColor
parameters.description: RGB color used as the transparent color when Style is swSketchPictureTransparencyUserDefined

parameters.name: MatchingTolerance
parameters.description: 0 = exact match 1 = less exact match indicating how closely MatchingColor must be to be considered a transparent color when Style is swSketchPictureTransparencyUserDefined

title: ISketchPicture.SetTransparency
description: Sets the transparency parameters of this picture on the sketch.
signature:
System.Boolean SetTransparency( 
   System.Int32
Style
,
   System.Double
Transparency
,
   System.Int32
MatchingColor
,
   System.Double
MatchingTolerance
)

parameters.name: Transparency
parameters.description: 0 = opaque 1 = transparent describing the relative transparency depending on the value of Style

parameters.name: MatchingColor
parameters.description: RGB color used as the transparent color when Style is swSketchPictureTransparencyUserDefined

parameters.name: MatchingTolerance
parameters.description: 0 = exact match 1 = less exact match indicating how closely MatchingColor must be to be considered a transparent color when Style is swSketchPictureTransparencyUserDefined

returns: True if transparency is set, false if not
